oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Christian Brothers College: "President's Report"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Engineering; Science; Buildings
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A report, written by Brother Thomas Lambert for the Belltower magazine in 1959, detailed the changes taking place at CBC, and offered a taste of what was to come. He discussed the beginning of physics and mathematics departments the coming fall, as well as plans for a new engineering building, a "union building and a 700 seat auditorium," as well as construction by the US Marine Corps.
